Question.Subject: Why Can't I Go On My Twitter?
Question.Content:
When I go to my Twitter account today it said: 'Do you want to view only the webpage content that is secure' or something like that and whether I choose yes or no it will always close the window and say that 'Internet cannot display the webpage'.
What's going on?!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I do believe Twitter is down. Probs something to do with the Daylight Savings Time, or the Beiber fans broke it.
Edit: They have a status report up that they are aware of frozen timelines and are fixing it. I can get on from my Blackberry but not from my laptop. Weird.

Answer.Content:
I do believe Twitter is down. Probs something to do with the Daylight Savings Time, or the Beiber fans broke it.
Edit: They have a status report up that they are aware of frozen timelines and are fixing it. I can get on from my Blackberry but not from my laptop. Weird.

Twitter always does that.
You can view private Twitter tweets @ http://viewmorepix.com
